body.name: Large Aluminium Wind Chimes 37" Inches to Create a Zen Atmosphere for Outdoor, Garden, Patio Decoration with Wind Catcher, Classic Black, Suitable as A Gift for Unisex

features: ♪【Meaningful Gifts】The aluminium wind chime is the most creative gift, it is suitable for various representative dates, such as Mother's Day, anniversary, birthday, party, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year, housewarming, etc. It is also suitable for sending a variety of people, such as mom, friend, confidant, colleague, neighbour, etc.

♪【Pro Tune】The professional tuner assisted with the tuning, trying a variety of materials before choosing a 13mm thick aluminium tube to adjust to a deep tonal B major pentatonic scale. When the breeze blows the windcatcher and drives the aluminium tube to resonate, you will hear the deep tone. For you who are lounging on the patio, the breeze blowing the wind chimes is a pleasure, the atmosphere is intoxicating and it can relax your body and mind.

♪【Artistic Decoration】Do you want to make your yard more vibrant and artistic? Just buy a 37 inches aluminium wind chime, it is perfect for lawn, garden, patio, backyard, front yard, hall, hallway, balcony, roof, living room, bedroom, dining room decoration, as long as you have the idea of adding beautiful melody and artistic decoration to your space, you can't go wrong to buy a wind chime.

♪【Bigger and Better】The wind chime is made of aluminum pipe and pine. The total length of the wind chime from the top's S-shaped hook to the bottom's catcher is 37" Among them, six classic black anodized aluminum tubes have excellent corrosion resistance and wear resistance, and the length ranges from 8.7" to 12.6". The wood is made of wear-resistant and non-cracking pine. The adjustable wooden striker allows you to adjust your favorite position at will.

♪【Love & Peace】It is said in Anna Karenina that happy families are alike, and unfortunate families have their own misfortunes. When people buy wind chimes, they may have assorted reasons, both happy and sad, but no matter what they are, what they have in common are kindness, love and peace. Finally, customer experience is our lifelong pursuit, if you have any questions, please contact us, we will actively communicate and will provide satisfactory pre-sales and after-sales services.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Quality Thick-walled aluminum alloy tubeSix tubes made of anodized aluminumThick, corrosion resistant and rust proof
Adjust as You Wish Top AdjustableAdjustable firing pin to accommodate different modes
Pine Wood and Durable Strings The wooden parts are made of high-quality pine for outstanding durability and high wear resistance.The thickened nylon strings are very durable and sunlight resistant.

Feel a moment of peace in a noisy city, where beauty resonates strongly in people's hearts Take a moment to feel nature. Listen! Isn't the sound of the wind blowing the wind chimes the sound of nature? This is a large wind chime with a total length of 37" from the top of the hoop to the bottom of the wind catcher. Its six aluminum tubes measure 5.11"-13" and are professionally calibrated to create a pleasing chorus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful looks and sounds
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set of chimes as a random gift for my wife after she mentioned wanting some. This set is very pretty to look at, which is part of why I chose them. They are a nice size and length and make beautiful sound, even with gentle breezes. The hook at the top is a great size, allowing this to hang easily. They seem to be well made with good quality materials.We only recently purchased this, so I can't speak to longevity of the wood, finish, or string, but we don't have ours installed in direct sunlight or direct rain, so I'm hopeful it will last a long time.For the price, I think you'll be satisfied with your purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Windchimes!
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves windchimes. I purchased these as a Christmas gift and he loves them. The sound is very rich and pleasing to the ear. The price was very reasonable and they are well made. Good wood and look great. Delivery was fast. I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chimes are beautifully made and of great quality. I live in Florida where it gets very windy and they are so sturdy. Most important is the sound...comforting and perfect. Highly recommend and, in fact, I just ordered one more chime just like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WIndchime is a part of my life, and this is the best wind chime EVER!
reviews.reviewText: Wind chimes have been my thing since I was a kid, bringing back loads of memories and nostalgic vibes. Just got this one off Amazon, and when I opened it up, I let it swing. Seriously, it's the most beautiful tone and melody I ever heard! The sound, the length, the melody—everything about it is like a trip down memory lane, giving off some serious chill vibes.Beside the sounds, it's like a little slice of tranquility. If you're all about catching some peace, I totally recommend this windchime! I can't vouch for how long it'll last, but I'm planning to hang it on my covered patio, ready for some hot-humid nights in Florida lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice wind chime
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, great quality and value. Sounds good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this based on price, plainness, and size.After hanging outdoors, the tones from the slightest breeze sounded better than I hoped.This is now my favorite chime set to hear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and well made. They sound lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't take a lot of wind to chime.
reviews.reviewText: It has a good tone and functions very well. I am waiting to see if it can stand the air on the NC coast, there is a lot of salty air around. Ask me again in five years.
